summary: REQ-7 and REQ-8 appear implemented: builder page heading and footer branding updated to “yourlove”, and the HTML document <title> is set to “yourlove”. One extra footer attribution/link (caffeine.ai) is present that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated footer attribution content linking to caffeine.ai (“Built with … using caffeine.ai”).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to rename branding to “yourlove” (heading/footer text) and set the HTML title; it did not request adding third-party attribution or outbound links in the footer.
